congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: United States-Caribbean Strategic Engagement Act of 2016
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 4939, amended, to increase engagement with the governments of the Caribbean region, the Caribbean diaspora community in the United States, and the private sector and civil society in both the United States and the Caribbean, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 386 yeas to 6 nays, Roll No. 297; and

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Networking and Information Technology Research and Development Modernization Act of 2016
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 5312, amended, to amend the High-Performance Computing Act of 1991 to authorize activities for support of networking and information technology research, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 385 yeas to 7 nays, Roll No. 298;
